website_summaries.verdict: A stackable plush adds to the musical fun. With 3 characters to choose from, your child can collect and stack a whole shark family.
pros: Plays 4 abbreviated versus of the song Baby Shark
Small size is easy to squeeze and carry with little hands
cons: Abbreviated verses may be a disappointment
Includes a lot of tags that need to be cut upon opening

customer_reviews.title: False advertising - does NOT play the whole song
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for this and pre-ordered it. However, I was extremely disappointed to find out that it doesn't play the whole song. In the question and answer section of this item, "Kayla - manufacturer" claimed multiple times that it does play the whole song. This is false advertising! The song stops after "let's go hunt". Very disappointing :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you need your phone back, try this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 yr old son for Christmas to get him to stop stealing my phone to play Baby Shark. 😂 I fully expected to be annoyed out of my mind and to remove the batteries after a bit. I have to say, I am thoroughly impressed. It is not too loud, and you can also squeeze it again to make the sing stop. He enjoys playing a little and then squeezing to make it stop. If you are on the fence but would also like to reclaim your phone, I recommend. It is a great little size, and if you hate it more than me, the batteries are indeed removable. 😂
customer_reviews.author: Susan K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: gifts for dear friends kids
customer_reviews.text: I love giving toddlers things parents will step on and or wreck a vacume cleaner with. These though not that were perfect gifts. Both beloved and annoying...
customer_reviews.author: just george

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for baby shark fans
customer_reviews.text: Cute and small about the size of a baseball. Mine came lopsided around the face. I want too exchange but it might be too late since Xmas is near. FYI this does not play the whole song only 30 second of it
customer_reviews.author: j.n

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, great quality, see video
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and surprisingly great quality for the price. Like the size of those fluffy dice we used to hang from our car mirrors lol. Song is clear and perfect volume. Plays mommy, daddy, shark and the hunt. Does not do grma or grmpa shark but hey its 8 bucks!
customer_reviews.author: michelle schefe

customer_reviews.title: Super cute perfect for little ones
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 14 month old and it’s the perfect size! (think softball sizes) plays a good portion of the baby shark song. Very easy to press unlike other singing stuffed animals. It’s going to be a stocking stuffer although he grabbed this out of the box first 😂 worth the $7.99
customer_reviews.author: LOlive

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% impressed
customer_reviews.text: This is cute but really nothing more than a small cube. The music sounds good. You squeeze and it plays. The reason I am giving it a 3 star is because the stitching is visible in one side and looks terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Hribal

customer_reviews.title: Cute! Doesn't play whole song though.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! Only complaint is that is does not play the whole song. In the Q&A section the manufacturer specifically stated that it plays the whole song.
customer_reviews.author: John Barber

customer_reviews.title: Annoying
customer_reviews.text: So annoying !! Yes it's fun for the kids they absolutely adore it but after like 5 minutes of the song blasting in my ears non stop I found my self opening up the shark and trying to find a volume down button yet to my avail there wasn't one. it's just one volume and your kids would love pressing it to play over and over again so get ready.! Be prepared and get yourself some noise cancellation headphones because you will want to throw that baby shark against the wall after a couple hours like I did. !!!
customer_reviews.author: cLo

customer_reviews.title: Not full song
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 14 month old who loves this song. It's perfect! I dont personally mind that it only plays half the song but I do feel it was false advertising to say it does. But its portable, it goes in the diaper bag with is for diaper changes (keeps him entertained and not rolling away!) And its quiet enough that you can not hear it 20 feet away, so I dont feel we are bothering others with it. Would like to see it improved with the full song, and a volume toggle (so the whole room can hear it when wanted)
customer_reviews.author: Nikki and Jared

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not loud enough
customer_reviews.text: This was cute. However, the volume is very low. It's a nice size for toddler hands & is soft. I gifted this one and bought the book for my toddler instead. I got them both about 8 months ago. The book has about 10-12 full-ish songs, is plenty loud enough (without being annoyingly loud) and is still holding up nicely. The cover & pages are a hard, sturdy material. It wipes off nicely also, from when he's snacking. Get the book instead. Or just use this one as a cuddly toy. The song feature won't help much since you can't really hear it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: This was in my daughters first Easter basket and has been a big hit with her for nearly a year now. She looooves the baby shark song, which this little cube shaped shark plays when squeezed. We've got half a dozen baby shark singing toys now, but this was the first one and I think is still a favorite. It is very small, but that makes it nice and portable (kept it in the diaper bag when she was younger to distract her from crying when we were out).
customer_reviews.author: StarDust

customer_reviews.title: 1 yr old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my god baby. He’s about 16 months. He opened his present and seemed confused when he looked at it, then I squeezed it and his face lit up! He got so excited, started dancing and shaking it around using the tag! His older brother (nearly 3 years old) got jealous and wanted one too. He used the fins to dance around haha. It was an excellent gift for the little ones. Their mother also seemed to appreciate the feature to turn off the singing (just squeeze again).
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy! Wish it played more of the song
customer_reviews.text: This toy is adorable for any Baby Shark fan. It's soft, cuddly, and easy for the little ones to squeeze when they want to hear the song. I like that it's small enough to be held, so my daughter can carry it around easily and snuggle up with it in one hand. My only complaint is that it cuts off at a weird part. If I remember correctly, it plays the song all the way to "Grandpa shark," and than randomly cuts off mid-verse. Other than that, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift for young kids
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this toy originally at Target at a significantly higher price point and our toddler absolutely loved it! It’s a perfect size to fit in little hands and easy to activate the singing mechanism. We ended up purchasing another one for our toddler and a few more as gifts for our friends’ kids. Would highly recommend to all parents whose little ones love baby shark! If ours continues to enjoy it, we will be adding mommy and daddy sharks to the family ☺️
customer_reviews.author: VGP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old is in love with Baby Shark! This little plush is the perfect thing for him. I also bought a bigger singing plush, but didn’t realize until it arrived that it’s a puppet and has to be operated by hand, which I don’t think he’ll be able to do just yet. This Baby Shark cube is the right size for him to haul around, and all you have to do is tap the top to make it sing! He hasn’t seen it yet, since it’s a present from Santa ;) but I’m sure he’s gonna love it! (And if there are any issues I will update this review)
customer_reviews.author: Kate Healy

customer_reviews.title: SMALL-Read the Dimensions Before Buying!
customer_reviews.text: It was my fault for not looking into the exact size so I was disappointed at how small it was, only about 3” square. For the price, I could have bought a much larger plush but I learned my lesson. It’s still cute and plays that song that every kid loves. Definitely shop around because for $2 more I was able to buy 3 sharks (mommy, daddy, baby) that all play that catchy tune! Baby 🦈, do-do do-do-do-do
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Katsoulis

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars for Baby Shark!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love baby shark! This was such a cute gift to give! Plays her favorite song and the best part for me is it is washable! My dog got a hold of it and made it all yucky, but I was able to un-velcro the bottom, take the sound box out, machine wash it, and it's good as new! We now have the pink mommy shark one too!
customer_reviews.author: Devan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We love this toy! Such a cute little baby shark cube. My 3 year old loves it. Well made. The only thing I'm disappointed about is that after i gave this to him I found out there was a family 3 pack of them (mommy daddy and baby) for 14$ which i would have gotten instead of the individual baby shark. Great purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Casey Bieber

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I should start off by saying my son who is 2 loves this thing. However, I was disappointed. I should have read the reviews ahead of time because it only sings part of the song (baby shark, mommy shark, daddy shark, let’s go hunt). Also the batteries were losing charge on day 2 or 3. I may end up returning.
customer_reviews.author: K. M. S. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son as a stocking stuffer he absolutely loves it. Doesn’t play the full song but does play a good chunk of it. (Up to lets go hunt). It’s a good size for little hands and very soft. Not very easy for little ones to squeeze and activate the song but my son figured out how to smash it on something and it’ll play.
customer_reviews.author: ❤️MERMAiDMAMA❤️

customer_reviews.title: It's small, but cute!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my nephew. It was smaller than I excepted, and not super soft / squishy due to the singing element inside of the toy but not hard enough to hurt if its thrown around. The singing box is not quiet so parents beware! Overall he liked it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Dramatically decreased the number of Baby Shark daily views
customer_reviews.text: My two year old, like most children her age is obsessed with what our how's refers to as "Shar Bany". The creators of this toy are genius! It is loud enough to sufficiently satisfy her craving for the song but quiet enough that I no longer quietly plot the death of all sharks. Since the purchase of this toy we have regained use of our television and tablets. Unfortunately we first used our freedom to turn on the news that was a horrible mistake as "Shar Bany" is far less annoying than the state of the world today!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Hall

customer_reviews.title: plays the song, but not the whole song so parents can maintain sanity
customer_reviews.text: baby/momma/daddy/the end...no grandparent sharks, which makes the song significantly shorter. My 1.5 year old can squeeze this by herself to get the song to play and giggles with delight every time. Perfect and very enjoyable for the price. As a parent, I appreciate that it is small enough to be hidden in the back of the closet for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Thirtysomething. Working Mom of 2 two-and-under.

customer_reviews.title: Small toy
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute, but it’s palm sized! I knew it would be small but not this small. I still am glad I got it but next time I would definitely buy another toy to go with this as a gift. But it sings and that’s what matters
customer_reviews.author: J. Marie

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Loves It
customer_reviews.text: If your kid or grandkid loves this very annoying song, this is the toy for you! Its the perfect size for a toddler to hold and squeeze, and the perfect size for the parents to hide to get a break from that song playing all day. Overall good investment if you don't mind hearing that song all day everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron and Emily

customer_reviews.title: I love it...great stocking stuffer for a toddler!
customer_reviews.text: I like it....I don't care to hear the whole song. I know some people complained about that. Trust me you will still have to play baby bum for your baby anyways so this is just for them to play with in the car or something. It's def cute. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G.

customer_reviews.title: Soft & just right volume
customer_reviews.text: My 18 months old great grandson loves this singing toy. He smiles everytime he sees it and dances every time the music plays. Also it's soft enough so that when he throws it, 🙂 as babies often do, no one gets hurt.
customer_reviews.author: C.K.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: All of my grand kids are 5 and under and they all love Baby Shark. I bought this small one for the 2 year old and he loves it. Easy for him to pick up and throw it. I was glad the song was loud enough to hear. I purchased the larger size for his big brother. Both were extremely happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Nance1951

customer_reviews.title: Will not survive impacts!
customer_reviews.text: Its super fun and cute! My kids loved it! The major problem was that it fell off the counter and stopped singing. It's way too sensitive to be made for kids if it'll break that easily. So now my son's toy is broken and he didnt even do it! I don't really know if I can recommend these for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne H.

customer_reviews.title: Better then I thought it would be!
customer_reviews.text: Lol, my dog loves it! He's a Blue pit, Rot,& Sharp mix. This was a gift for my niece but to see his face made me just give it to him. He can't stop playing with it! Great product. Very soft and plays the whole song
customer_reviews.author: Joe Brown

customer_reviews.title: Baby Shark!
customer_reviews.text: Simple little plushie. Sings baby shark, mama shark, daddy shark and let's go hunt (I think that's the last one). Note: if this is a song that gets on your nerves, DO NOT BUY THIS. For some reason Baby Shark doesn't annoy me, so it's a fun addition to our toy collection.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel K

customer_reviews.title: Small and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Alot smaller then expected!!! I thought it was going to be bigger but I guess I should have known it was going to be small due to the price. But my son loves it!!! It's also not as loud as I thought it be but he can hear it and it brings a smile to his face so I guess that's all that matters lol he loves it alot
customer_reviews.author: Nettie

customer_reviews.title: Not full song.
customer_reviews.text: Cute, very small which you can tell if you scroll through the pictures. Only sings partial song. "Baby..., mommy..., daddy... Let's go hunt." Both a blessing and a curse but not as loud as I thought it would be. Daughter had 1 against each ear. Granted she likes loud and I'm glad I can't hear it across the house.
customer_reviews.author: Pyper541

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Fun-size
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable! Our son is obsessed! As soon as I saw that I could pre-order, I did, that day! Yes, they are little smaller than I thought BUT doesn’t affect my review. They are cute, loud enough and keep my son happy! Only one complaint, nothing huge, just weird, is that it plays only to “Let’s go hunt”.. Perfect gift for any Baby Shark lover!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift hit
customer_reviews.text: This plush was a hit for Christmas gifts for my niece and nephew. The catchy song was a great volume where all can hear, and the toy is about the size of a red apple and/or orange. Order it, you'll be glad you did. It kept the kids busy.
customer_reviews.author: Krysta

customer_reviews.title: The best little toy around
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this toy! It doesnt sing the entire song, but sings enough to not drive you insane when pressed over and over again. In fact you might find yourself pressing the button and then throwing into a room or at your spouse.. or into a room at your spouse while you hold the door shut as they struggle to find an off switch that isnt there. It's great fun for children AND adults
customer_reviews.author: Z0MBI3 Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Cute little fuzzy. Cute little song
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 7 month old grandson. Of course he loves it. Parents maybe not so much. Hahaha It plays parts of baby shark when you press it. Only a couple of verses so you don't get completely crazy
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hubka

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Not too loud either. My son takes this everywhere. Its quiet enough so when we're at the store it doesn't disturb other shoppers, but loud enough to hear if you're within 6 feet of it
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Super cute toy
customer_reviews.text: My son will love receiving this on Christmas. I knew it was going to be small when I ordered based on the advertised pictures and the price. It's small enough that my 3 year old will be able to carry it around with us when we go out and I can throw it in my purse when needed. It plays baby shark, mommy shark, daddy Sharm, and let's go hunt then ends. Its loud enough for a little one to enjoy it without being to loud to annoy me. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Graham

customer_reviews.title: Baby shark on the go!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for the parents of children who can not get enough of baby shark! We've had this product for a few months and still have yet to replace the batteries. This is nice, soft and, great to stash in small spaces. This is the baby shark item that is always in my diaper bag, fits perfectly and no too loud either!
customer_reviews.author: Biancakarlsbarch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The best baby shark plushy toy that I have been able to find it’s the only one that plays the entire song with one click of a button unlike the puppets were the parent has to physically word out every piece of the sign with their hand I’m sure that others are just like me with little to no patience with that song so if you want your kids to be happy with less effort for you perfection is here lol
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Aimaro

customer_reviews.title: Two extremely happy toddlers loved this gift.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two. One for my nephew and one for my niece. They both went nuts for it. Sings most of the song. Very soft and easy for little hands to squeeze to activate the song. Volume is at a good level where it isn't too loud that it's obnoxious.
customer_reviews.author: darcy Bondhus

customer_reviews.title: A 2 year old’s favorite toy with an off switch that makes parents happy
customer_reviews.text: One of my daughter’s favorite Christmas gifts. I particularly like that if the song is playing you can press the button again to end it. And there’s an off switch on the sound box inside it if you want to turn the sound off completely.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Douglass

customer_reviews.title: Baby shark dooooodoooo
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 10month old daughter for Xmas and she loves it. The song is only about 10 seconds long. It is soft and plush. I don’t know if there is a battery option. I haven’t had to replce it yet and we press on it a lot for the music.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids, maybe kind of annoying for parents.
customer_reviews.text: Giving this a great review because my kids love this thing. I, on the other hand, will never hear the end of this song and will have it stuck in my head for all of eternity.
customer_reviews.author: Mason Grey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t even work!
customer_reviews.text: I received mine yesterday. It’s suppose to be one of my sons Christmas presents and it doesn’t even work!!! Pulled the tab out nothing! Took it apart and checked the batteries, nothing!!! How ridicules I was so excited for this present!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: perfect baby shark for babies or 3year old
customer_reviews.text: These Shark Family cube dolls are the perfect size for kids to squeeze, stack, and carry around. You can also tuck them in your bag for fun on the go! is easy to carry on. and perfect to distract them from using cell phone or start eating.
customer_reviews.author: cristina

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but also very small
customer_reviews.text: I shouldve looked at the dimensions better for this product becasue it is kind of small. It is great for babies because it's the size of a small block but if you're looking for something thats more substantial this is definitely not.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe

customer_reviews.title: Cut the cord on YouTube (at least for Baby Shark)!
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY, I have a way for my kid to constantly play Baby Shark by Pink Fong without using bandwidth. I was getting concerned that we were going to be on some sort of FBI watchlist, but huzzah! We have now cut the cord on this particular YouTube sensation! Thank you WowWee!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric WF

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this baby shark for my 2 yr old grandson. He just loved it. It was so easy for him to press on it to make it sing. And it was just the right size for his little hands. I totally recommend this for any little kid.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Morrison

customer_reviews.title: baby shark doo doo --- arghhh
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit, I have a love/hate relationship with this thing. I have two smaller children and guess how many times in a day I hear this song? ARGH!!!!! doo doo doo!!! doh! Well, as long as the kiddos love, I guess I have to suck it up. lol
customer_reviews.author: BenSam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stocking stuffer for my 1 year old!
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old loved this!! Just one squeeze & it’s singing his favorite song. Perfect to take just about anywhere since it’s so small. I pack it in his bag to use during diaper changes if we’re out & about since he likes to squirm around! It distracts him.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: No More Remote Hunt
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy. It's small enough for his little hands and we only had to show him how to start the song twice. Easy to use and so helpful. Now, I don't have to find my phone or remote to play the song. BONUS It doesn't play the whole song. It just plays Baby, Mommy, Daddy, hunt. I'm grateful for this shortened version.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! I bought this for my toddler, and we both love it! It’s soft, cute and the sound is very clear. It plays 4 verses of the baby shark song. The volume is loud and clear, but not too loud. It fits in the palm of my hand and is easy for my little one to hold onto. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Candice L.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toy for your Baby Shark
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a fun toy for kids who live baby shark. Like other reviewers said, it is small, but that's what I expected. It is a great size for toddler hands. The song plays a little quieter than my preference, but I don't mind that in the car! Bottom line, my son loves it and he'd give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Shartastic
customer_reviews.text: Loved the fact that my son can squeeze this as much as he'd like to hear baby shark play and we all don't get annoyed by the repeating song because it is just loud enough for him to hear while he is holding it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The size is great for a toddler. Its soft, the song is good and clear. It doesn't play the whole song but my kid doesn't care and as for myself im cool not hearing the whole song. This suited us better than a full size stuffed animal. And easier to travel with this
customer_reviews.author: JROD41

customer_reviews.title: Cute & affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 1yr bday gift. She is going to love it! Music is clear & loud enough. Paid $7 bucks- not bad!
customer_reviews.author: Rsladay

customer_reviews.title: Cute! My pups love it.
customer_reviews.text: The pups love it! Very cute and soft. The music is low volume, which I like. Presentation is basic....wrapped in plastic bag to ship. Everyone who’s sent it and watched the dogs play want one for thei furbabies.
customer_reviews.author: J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Paybacks
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a different type through Amazon and A. it was 2 months late B. It didn’t work at all. So I ordered this one and my diabolical plan to annoy my friends by sending this to their 3 year old worked perfect! She wouldn’t put it down for over a week, she loves it and still plays it a month later.
customer_reviews.author: hb

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute!! Wasn’t sure if they all sang the same song, but they do. They are a lot smaller than I expected, maybe softball size? But they are awesome :)
customer_reviews.author: Tmhale

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy and pleased with this product. Its soft sings the song and it was definitely worth the price. Compared to other products of baby shark that are cheaply made and cost $20 this is made great and priced reasonably.
customer_reviews.author: brooke

customer_reviews.title: My son LOOOOOVES this thing
customer_reviews.text: It's not very big- good for his 2 year old hands and bonus!- It's not super loud & obnoxious. One squeeze gets the song started, and another squeeze turns it off.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie S

customer_reviews.title: Not awful but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Its smaller than I expected, and the batteries didn’t work. I tried rotating them and they worked for about 5 total song rotations but I haven’t replaced the batteries to see if it was that or the little music box though. The sound is muffled and though I didn’t expect the whole song, it is very short.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Huth

customer_reviews.title: Ad free, uninterupted baby shark music
customer_reviews.text: My kid is obsessed with this song and she loves the little plush sharks. It took her a few tries to get it to work but she has it. I highly recommend this for anyone who has a young child.
customer_reviews.author: MissA

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than everywhere else, fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little guy and my baby does more!!! I bought it for $7 and they were selling them at the Baby Shark concert for $15! Great buy!! Didn’t play the whole song, but my daughter doesn’t care at all.
customer_reviews.author: Valentine J. Mikel

customer_reviews.title: Song is Stuck in my Head!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gift to give to someone you don't live with. I thought this was so cute, but was so relieved I could give it to someone else, instead of giving to my nephew (in which case I would have to continue to hear this song constantly).
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Cute quick gift that your kid will love
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this little thing. She sings along with it and carts it around everywhere she goes. As annoying as the song can get I still smile because I know she's enjoying it and having fun.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff Nic

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This item was a gift for a toddler turning 3. I was surprised that after watching how to operate it he was able to push the shark on his own to play the song. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Baby girl loves this darn thing, she hasn't figured out how to squeeze it yet (which my husband loves). When we squeeze it for her she gets ridiculously excited and starts dancing. I love that it's not overly loud so it really doesn't bother me, even in the car.
customer_reviews.author: On Top Of Tech

customer_reviews.title: Fun little toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, for my two 2 year old grandkids. They both loved them. When they figured out that they sing, they danced around to the song. This was a great stocking stuffer.
customer_reviews.author: gingerbread

customer_reviews.title: Great price, super cute!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a Christmas gift for our 1 year old! He loves the Baby shark song and thought this would be a perfect small gift. It's compact in size but has great sound quality for its size. It's has a cute cube design and was very well priced.
customer_reviews.author: John and Family

customer_reviews.title: Little one loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 18 months old loves it and can easily start the music on his own. The volume is not very high, which we like.
customer_reviews.author: Moran

customer_reviews.title: This won Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: My son is just over a year old and this is easy for him to push the button and listen to the song over and over again. I know some parents hate the song but it makes him so happy. He calls it his "Doo Doo" and does the hand motions. We love it! 10 stars! Would gladly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dray

customer_reviews.title: wow wee
customer_reviews.text: IT's really small. I thought it would have been bigger. Sounds really good though. Bought this for my baby for valentines day. I know she will love it, but for the price and the wait time it is not worth it, but to see her smile and laugh it was...
customer_reviews.author: Elikiah

customer_reviews.title: It’s Going to be Okay, Parents
customer_reviews.text: One of the more annoying gifts I gave my daughter for Christmas. Her smile is usually enough to make me not mind the doo doo doo.
customer_reviews.author: A. Skilton

customer_reviews.title: Everything is just right.
customer_reviews.text: Cute, soft, perfect size for little hands. It only plays the first 4 verses (Baby, Mommy, Daddy, Let’s go hunt) but it doesn’t seem to bother my kids. To me, the bonus is the volume is just right, not too loud to drive me crazy.
customer_reviews.author: TranPhamily

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than I thought it would be. Volume is at a very nice level. Not too loud that it’s annoying but loud enough for the kids to dance too while having fun. Easy to squeeze and turn on and off. Going to be buying more very soon.
customer_reviews.author: jeani burd

customer_reviews.title: Only plays part of song
customer_reviews.text: Nice toy to have Baby Shark on the go and to help with meltdowns at Target! My only wish is that this played the full song and not just half. Also, needs to be a little easier for tiny hands to start the song.
customer_reviews.author: lindsey

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 1 year old granddaughter...she loves the Baby shark song, and the cube teaches eye hand coordination. She has to press it to get it to play. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SHERRY WOOD

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, but cute toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for Easter and she was so excited! Doesn’t play the full song, but we find that as a positive lol. And you can click it again once it’s playing to turn it off mid song. It’s tiny for the price, so that’s probably the only con.
customer_reviews.author: Beth M

customer_reviews.title: All the kids want it !
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old daughter literally Loves this toy and dances all over the house to her favorite song! I don’t take it in public anymore bc we have a hard time keeping it out of other children’s hands.. I don’t mind letting them play with it but it causes a fuss when it’s time for us to leave and ask for it back. Everyone needs/wants a baby shark that sings their favorite song ! (:
customer_reviews.author: Kyleigh Tobias

customer_reviews.title: Lil baby shark
customer_reviews.text: O.M.G. Cutes baby shark toy ever made. it’s soft, small and it sings the baby shark song, great for the price. My son loves it and he takes it w/ him everywhere we go because it so small it fits in his lil backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs:Andino

customer_reviews.title: Good toy
customer_reviews.text: Super durable. Daughter throws all the time and it still works. Also it isn't to loud so hearing it constantly isn't annoying
customer_reviews.author: Andria

customer_reviews.title: Cute but...
customer_reviews.text: This is cute but hardly works. The song will barely play through before it cuts it off. My 2 year old was very sad after several attempts to use it and nothing played or just briefly came on.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't play the entire song, but close. Confuses my daughter who wants to go through all the motions. But it saves me from playing the song constantly on my phone. Cute Easter basket stuffer.
customer_reviews.author: Couponanimal

customer_reviews.title: Eh. Not the greatest.
customer_reviews.text: Meh. I thought my kid would enjoy this a lot more, but it is very small and not very loud. She squeezed it once and hasn't touched it again. I'm glad I only paid $7 for it or it would be going back. It is cute, but that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: Camilla L. Britt

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Toddler daughter is obsessed with baby shark. This isn’t really annoying either. And she can push it herself to play the song. Perfect size for her hands.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Baby Shark
customer_reviews.text: My toddler grandsons like all things Baby Shark. Even their faithful friend and playmate, the family dog, thinks this toy is worthy of playing with.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: When you need this, it's indespensible
customer_reviews.text: the Baby Shark tune provided near instantaneous calming to our 3 month old grandson . This product provides a four verse rendition which is usually enough and is in a cute, soft toy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect it to be small enough to fit in the palm of my hand, but it is. The sound isn't very loud, but being as small as it is I guess that's to be expected. This was a gift for my 2 year old and he loves it, so he won't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Hern

customer_reviews.title: Baby shark!!
customer_reviews.text: My 16 month old loves pinkfong songs so much so I was so excited to find this for her for Christmas, she gets such a kick out of it. It's small, but really the perfect size for her and it plays plenty of the song.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use and perfect size for little hands
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect size for a infant on up. Happy it plays the whole song and not just a snippet. Kids of all ages have loved it in my home day care.
customer_reviews.author: jenjenjen

customer_reviews.title: Small but cute
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected. Gift for my toddler. Hes obsessed with the song so even though it was small, he really loved it because it played the song. He carries it around with everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Manda

customer_reviews.title: Big let down!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was way smaller than presented and it did not play music as promised weird thing it had instructions and area for location of mechanism but nothing there then when I tried to return this junk it said can't be returned how do u sell defective product and say no return I had to call CS for rf wow big big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: gloria gray

customer_reviews.title: NO batteries
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute and my daughter likes it, but “long lasting batteries included” is a lie. It came dead as a door nail. Doesn’t make any noise and there isn’t even batteries in the toy or bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kortni

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little hands
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is the sound is not very loud. We had to have everyone quiet just so we could hear it. That being said, my 2yr old granddaughter Loved it!! Immediately started dancing.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit. Sturdy. Takes a kicking and keeps on tickin. Pay attention to the dimensions. It's very small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, giftable, lightweight, soft, does not play whole song
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, it is very cute, soft, lightweight, and overall really awesome. The only thing I would add is that it does not play the entire song.
customer_reviews.author: Carlene

product_meta.title: WowWee Pinkfong Baby Shark Official Song Cube - Baby Shark
product_meta.description: Meet our stackable, collectible shark family sound cube dolls! Squeeze them to hear the baby shark song, the global sensation with over 3.3 billion views! Collect all 3 of your favorite characters: baby shark, mommy shark and Daddy shark!
feature_bullets: Produced by WowWee for Pinkfong, official creator of the global hit song Baby Shark!
Squeeze to hear 4 verses of the official Baby Shark song (English version)!
Collect all 3 of your favorite characters!
The product dimensions are 3 x 3 x 3.5 (inches)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,391 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
